description:
Reflective cord helps you find your gear at night (and keeps you from tripping over it). This cord is strong enough to hang a bear cache or rig shelters, and comes with MSR® CamRing cord tensioners that allow for a simple, knot-free set up.

  • Made of sturdy 3mm nylon with reflective accents
  • 4 6000-series aluminum cord tensioners lock securely, adjust easily, and eliminate the hassle of tying and retying knots in cold or wet weather
  • Length is 15m
name: MSR Reflective Utility Cord Kit
